name: Home Office Simulator
description:
Summary

Help Ayame to work remotely, keeping her free of distractions and keeping her cat interested. Upgrade your home, move to new apartments, and take care of several cats. Upgrade your apartment objects so she can work without distractions or with less chance of getting interrupted by any distractions.

Gameplay

Move to seven unique apartments with different distractions and upgrades to be made. Upgrade and eliminate several distractions, including cats, computers, phone calls, and notifications. Don't forget about neighbor noises, fire alarms, coffee machines, washing machines, water plants, power interruption, mosquitoes, bugs, falling items, and more!

Key Features

  • Free up distractions in your apartment
  • Explore seven unique apartments
  • Buy new cats to keep her happy
  • Upgrade and automate your apartment to live free of distractions

Objects, distractions and upgrades

Objects such as coffee machines and laptops may increase happiness of Ayame. Therefore she will work harder. Whenever you buy a new object, it comes with a distraction. It can stop work or cause problems. You can upgrade it to avoid distractions.

Cats!

  • Buy new cats to make Ayame even happier than she is!
  • They are also a significant source of distractions.
  • However, as long as you upgrade their feeder, water, and toys, you can keep them busy, and everybody will be happy!
